thread.title: Stacey Dash Terminated by Fox News, Twitter Erupts in Celebration
thread.title_full: Stacey Dash Terminated by Fox News, Twitter Erupts in Celebration

author: K. Campbell
title: Stacey Dash Terminated by Fox News, Twitter Erupts in Celebration
text:
Another Twitter user pointed out the celebratory reaction of black people on social media when they learned that Dash’s contract had been terminated. Fox: We fired Stacey Dash. 
— Heel Turn Haden (@_TheSonOfMars_) January 22, 2017 
While we don’t know the circumstances surrounding Fox’s decision not to renew Dash’s contract, the truth is that she was a solid, outspoken conservative who bravely risked this vile condemnation and shunning to stand up for what’s right, honest and fair. 
At times she may not have been politically correct in her comments, but she was willing to say what needed to be said, regardless of what it meant for her popularity. 
Those celebrating her dismissal from Fox shouldn’t get too happy too fast, as people as resilient as Dash have a way of coming out on top in the end. 
Like and share this article on Facebook and Twitter if you’re disgusted at how liberals on social media have been celebrating Fox News’ decision not to rehire Stacey Dash. Why do you think these liberals are celebrating Stacey Dash being terminated by Fox? Scroll down to comment below! Advertisement Popular Right Now
